app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Winlive Pro Karaoke Mobile
app_description: MAIN FEATURES Karaoke Offline Reading files: midi kar mp3 wave Cd G mp3 g txt and pdf with key transpose change tempo change instruments and saving management Mp4 and 3gp video player added You can add a .txt a pdf or an image to your midi and mp3 audio files You can disable auto play if need modify key tempo etc. before starting a new song Import Export .WLS files Winlive Saves You can access to big directories faster New soundfonts for midifile internal synth engine Many other new features and better performance... Unique to support the M live midi karaoke format Chords displays for midi kar and mp3 if included Karaoke display full size with background pictures Multi tracks mixer for midifile volume adjustment and instruments changes with saving system Management of 40 SongLists with possibility to book next song or more song on a temp songlist F10 Reading pdf pictures and txt files as a electronic book Fast search in a SongList or search by first letter File Browser to find a file in your device or setting a folder for SongList Searching a midi file on web intelligent Google Search Song list editor for set specific options for each song list loop melody muted for midifile stop random songs Loop files as a groove machine Many Options for customize your app A 64Mb midi GM sounds bank WSE approved by ProMusicSoftware labs the most powerful sound generator for mobile Midi Core support you can also connect your external midi device instead of internal WSE sounds This app only contains demo songs but is compatible with a large number of easily available files Midi player midifile player kar player mp3 player cdg player cd g player wave player wav player pdf reader videoplayer youtube player Multiplayer and karaoke systems bringing over 25 years experience and skills in leadership. Winlive the main protagonist of your karaoke and musical party Sing along wherever whenever ! Have fun with Winlive Pro Karaoke Mobile !
